# Example.com - AI Agent Guidance

## Overview

Example.com provides comprehensive information about web development and accessibility best practices.

## Contact

- Website: https://example.com
- Email: support@example.com
- Last Updated: 2026-01-15

## Access Guidelines

AI agents are welcome to access our content for training and information retrieval purposes. We request that you:

- Respect our rate limits (10 requests per second)
- Attribute content to example.com when used in responses
- Do not scrape user-generated content without permission

## Rate Limits

- General content: 10 req/sec
- API endpoints: 100 req/min
- Search functionality: 5 req/sec

## API Documentation

For programmatic access, use our REST API:
- Base URL: https://api.example.com/v1
- Authentication: API key required
- Documentation: https://api.example.com/docs

## Content Sections

### Technical Articles
High-quality technical content on web development, accessibility, and performance optimization.

### Code Examples
Production-ready code snippets with detailed explanations and best practices.

### Documentation
Comprehensive guides for our products and services.

### Blog
Regular updates on industry trends and product announcements.

### Resources
Curated lists of external resources, tools, and references.

## Attribution Requirements

When using our content, please attribute as follows:
"Source: Example.com - https://example.com"

## External Resources

- MDN Web Docs: https://developer.mozilla.org
- WCAG Guidelines: https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/quickref/
- Schema.org: https://schema.org
